short_summary: Update shipping solution for Distribution Centre
description: The Elections Canada Distribution Centre needs to update it’s current shipping solution which is nearing end of life.
full_summary:
### Title
Integrated Shipping Solution RFP

### Reference
[cb-817-56488920]

### Amendment Record
Total Amendments: 4
**Amendment 1** [Date: 2024-07-18], [PDF Link: `https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39877/ecsz-rfp-2024-3017-amendment-1.pdf`]
**Amendment 2** [Date: 2024-07-18], [PDF Link: `https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39877/ecsz-rfp-2024-3017-amendment-2.pdf`]
**Tender Notice** [Date: 2024-06-10], [PDF Link: `https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39877/ecsz-rfp-2024-3017---shipping-integrated-solution.pdf`]

### RFP Details

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Procurement Category and Scope
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Scope of Work**: The Elections Canada Distribution Centre requires an integrated shipping solution to replace the existing, end-of-life shipping solution.

### Contact
* **Contracting Agency**: Office of the Chief Electoral Officer of Canada (OECEO Canada)
* **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Québec, K1A 0M6, Canada
* **Contact Person**: Svetlana Zelyutkina
* **Phone**: (873) 416-0615
* **Email**: [Svetlana.Zelyutkina@elections.ca](mailto:Svetlana.Zelyutkina@elections.ca)

### Trade and Security Considerations
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Security Considerations**: None

### Completed RFP Documents
